entry.title: Pack of 2 | 52"x108" Chevron Design Thermal Blackout Curtains With Chrome Grommet Window Treatment Panels - White | Silver
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3160
Type: Curtains
Price: 24.49 - 139.49 (2 variants)

[About]

Blackout Curtains
Material: Polyester
Color: Silver/White
GSM: 230
Energy Efficient, Insulation, Noise Reduction, High Quality
Can Block up to 99% of Light & 60% of Noise
Package Contains Two (2) Panels
Each Panel Size: 52x108"
Header Type: Grommet
Grommet Ring Size: 1.6" Opening
Comes with a Heavy Duty Vinyl Bag
Each Panel Contains Eight (8) Chrome Grommets
Care Instructions: Cold Temp, Gentle Cycle w/Mild Detergent | Hang to Dry or Low Heat Dry.
Perfect for room divider, pair with backdrop stand
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Revamp your home décor with this pair of Thermal Grommet Curtain Panels in chic chevron pattern that will instantly give your space a contemporary update. Our innovative Thermal Insulated Curtain Panels are crafted from 100% polyester and feature blackout light filtration that assists in giving you a perfectly tranquil environment to rest easy and also reduce your utility costs by insulating unwanted light, UV rays, noise, heat, and cold. These functional curtains are constructed with blackout fibers interwoven to the curtains fabric, providing a layer of added insulation against light diffusion and outside temperature transfer for energy efficacy qualities. It is so easy now to darken a room for daytime sleep, movie watching, or to prevent sunlight glare, with our 100% Thermal Eyelet Top Curtain Panels.

Additional Information:
  • Material : Polyester
  • Color : Silver/White
  • 100% Thermal Insulation
  • Size : 52" W x 108" L
  • Header Type: Grommet
  • Grommet Ring Size : 1.6" Opening
  • Comes with a Heavy Duty Vinyl Bag
  • Quantity : 2 pcs
  • Each Panel Contains Eight (8) Chrome Grommets

entry.title: Pack of 2 | 52"X84" Lavender Soft Velvet Thermal Blackout Curtains With Chrome Grommet Window Treatment Panels
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3160
Type: Curtains
Price: 39.99 - 227.97 (2 variants)

[About]

Fabric: Polyester Velvet
Color: Lavender
Quality: 260 GSM
Ready to Use: Package includes a pair of panels of 52"Wx84" L
The backside color is the same as the front, keeps a good look from outside of the window.
Blocks Up to 90percent of intrusive light
Reduces Unwanted noise and offers thermal benefits
Lush velvet fabric emulates real theater curtains
Each Panel Contains Eight (8) Chrome Grommets
Care Instructions: Hand wash in cold water, line dry. Do not bleach/iron.
Perfect for room divider, pair with backdrop stand
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

    [Information]

    Add a touch of refined luxury to any space with our latest Designer Blackout Curtain Panels, featuring soft velvet design for a touch of texture. Woven of plush velvet, these deluxe drapes offer groundbreaking triple weave construction that effortlessly blocks up to 99% of UV rays and sunlight and 60% of outside noise from inflowing into your room. Our energy efficient blackout curtains are equipped with 100% thermal insulation to block summer heat and winter chill from affecting your room’s cozy temperature. Bring regal sophistication to your everyday life by outfitting your bedroom, living room, master suite or guest room in an endearing glamour with this chic curtain, showcasing a metallic grommet ring top and an exclusively elite look.

    Additional Information:

    • Fabric: Polyester Velvet
    • Color: Lavender
    • Quality: 260 GSM with Weave technology
    • Blackout Velvet Curtains with Thermal Insulated Polyester Darkening Lining
    • Ready Made: Package includes a pair of panels of 52" W x 84" L | 104" W x 84" L in total.
    • Light Dimming: Blocks up to 90% of light and 80% UV Rays that comes from outside.
    • Sound Dampening: Decreases the outside noise and can get the reflected sound be absorbed easily
    • Energy Smart: Saves Energy by blocking the direct sunlight
    • Easy to Maintain: Quick steam clean calms the fold line, refresh the fabric and keep them looks neat.

Quantity: 1 Ice Cream Base Stand + Bag of Tools
Material: Acrylic
Color: Clear
Style: 35-Slots Palette
Size: 16.25"L x 12.25"W x 3.25"H
Total Holes: 35
Each Hole Diameter: 0.75"
Acrylic Thickness: 2mm
Total Legs: 3
Each Leg Size: 3"L x 0.55" Diameter
Bag Of Tools Contents: 3 Legs + 3 Screws
Assembly Required: Yes
Need to remove double side film before Assembly. Easy to Assemble.
Great for displaying or serving desserts at parties and restaurant

Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Additional Information:

  • Screw Length: 0.5"L
  • Screw Top Diameter: 0.25"
  • Screw Bottom Diameter: 3mm
  • No Screw Driver needed - can place Screw and use Peg to screw in the nail
  • Perfect for wedding, birthday, upscale occasions, and any special events
  • WARNING: Not Microwave or Dishwasher Safe

entry.title: 8FTx8FT | Natural Vintage Wood Vinyl Party Backdrop, Rustic Wooden Floor Board Photography Background Party Banner
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3110
Type: Backdrops
Price: 25.19

[About]

Quantity: 1 Party Backdrop
Material: Vinyl
Style: Vintage Rustic Wood
Color: ﻿Natural
Height: 8FT
Width: 8FT
GSM: 110
Features: Bright colors, Cost-effective, Foldable storage, Light weight
Fix the backdrop to walls with nails or tape.
You can also support it with a backdrop stand and clamps instead.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

 

    [Information]

    Additional Information:

    • Since the Vinyl Backdrop do not have Rod Pockets (It is a Flat Backdrop), you will need to use Clamps to hang the item for use
    • Perfect for Indoor and Outdoor shooting.
    • You can also use some decorations to create a unique and exclusive party.
    • How to Care: Do not dry clean or machine wash. Wipe with a soft damp cloth. The item is sent folded and might have slight creases. If necessary, please iron the back surface with steam iron at low heat.  Or roll it up tightly with tube for 3-4 days. Please do not iron the front of the backdrop
    • Uses: Party, Baby Shower Event, Wedding Decoration, Newborn Baby, DIY Studios, Digital Photography, Video Shooting, Theme Parties.

    • Uses: Party, Baby Shower Event, Wedding Decoration, Newborn Baby, DIY Studios, Digital Photography, Video Shooting, Theme Parties.
